alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 30 at 2:16PM AKDT until July 03 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKDT SATURDAY NIGHT FOR LIGHTNING FOR UPPER KOYUKUK VALLEY... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning for lightning, which is in effect from noon Friday to midnight AKDT Saturday night. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Upper Koyukuk Valley south and east of Hughes on Friday and north and east of Hughes on Saturday. * TIMING...Noon Friday through Late Saturday Evening. Thunderstorms will occur Friday afternoon and evening and again on Saturday afternoon and evening. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...South 5 to 10 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 27 percent. * TEMPERATURES...55 to 84. * IMPACTS...Ample lightning could lead to numerous new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
